div.p: We thank the fieldworkers who collected the budburst dataset and Damien Farine for assistance with data analysis. This work was funded by a NERC grant NE/K006274/1 awarded to BCS and an EGI Fellowship awarded to EFC. BCS is a Wolfson Research Merit Award holder. The long‐term temperature data used in this study were collected by the Hadley Centre Central Observatory. Photo credit for the picture of two oak trees in Figure 1: Amy Hinks.
